sentence.Network_en: Raise one foot, curl the toes and point the foot down-wards.
sentence.Network_cn: 抬起一只脚，弯曲脚趾，使脚尖朝下。

sentence.Network_en: Universities are dipping their toes in the waters of management education.
sentence.Network_cn: 各大学正开始尝试进入管理教育领域。

sentence.Network_en: She pulled off her shoes and stockings and wriggled her toes.
sentence.Network_cn: 她脱下鞋袜，活动活动脚趾头。

i curled up my toes in my bed upstairs ., 我圈起我的脚尖在我上楼睡觉的时候.
he apologized for trampling on her toes .他因踩了她一脚向她道歉。

she proceeds with how to tackle stairs the toes and the secrets of seductive hip-wiggling ( arm-swinging ) ; I feel as if I am at a finishing school for femmes fatales .她接着又教我如何（用脚趾)对付台阶，以及充满诱惑力的扭臀（摆臂)秘诀；我感觉自己就好像置身于一所蛇蝎美女精修学校一样。

encyclopedia.content: 歌手介绍 生日 1987年4月11日 职业 流行歌手兼作曲人 现居住地 加拿大 多伦多 发行专辑数目 2张 发行时间 第一张专辑 Lights(EP) 发行于2008-04-22 第二张专辑The Listening发行于2009-09-22 个人成绩 歌曲 Drive My Soul 获得了 2008 加拿大单曲HOT100的第18 名 对音乐的描述 “当我写歌曲时，我考虑的是是它怎样使人有感觉。并且我希望当它进入您的耳朵时您也是感到愉快的。就想吃这一个美味的苹果派。”歌词 If you were a cli

entry.def: Your toes are the five movable parts at the end of each foot.
The toe of a shoe or sock is the part that covers the end of your foot.

If you dip your toes into something or dip your toes into the waters of something, you start doing that thing slowly and carefully, because you are not sure whether it will be successful or whether you will like it.

example.ex: This may encourage gold traders to dip their toes back into the markets...
example.tran: 这可能会促使黄金交易商谨慎地尝试重返市场。

example.ex: Universities are dipping their toes in the waters of management education.
example.tran: 各大学正开始尝试进入管理教育领域。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something keeps you on your toes, you mean that they cause you to remain alert and ready for anything that might happen.

example.ex: His fiery campaign rhetoric has kept opposition parties on their toes for months.
example.tran: 他激烈的竞选言辞使反对党派一连几个月都保持警觉。

entry.def: If you toe the line, you behave in the way that people in authority expect you to.

example.ex: ...attempts to persuade the rebel members to toe the line...
example.tran: 说服叛乱分子顺从政府的努力

example.ex: He's one of the politicians that wouldn't toe the party line.
example.tran: 他是不肯服从政党路线的几个政客之一。

entry.def: If you tread on someone's toes, you offend them by criticizing the way that they do something or by interfering in their affairs.

example.ex: I must be careful not to tread on their toes. My job is to challenge, but not threaten them.
example.tran: 我必须小心谨慎，不能得罪他们。我的工作是挑战他们，而不是威胁他们。
